#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	unsigned int t;
	scanf("%d", &t);
	while(t--)
	{
		unsigned int n;
		scanf("%d", &n);
		char op[n], s[n][21];
		int cnt=0;
		for(int i=0; i<n; i++)
		{
			scanf("%s %c", s[i], &op[i]);
			for(int j=i-1; j>=0; j--)
				if( strcmp(s[i], s[j])==0 )
				{
					if( op[j]=='+' )
						cnt--;
					else
						cnt++;
					break;
				}
			if( op[i]=='-' )
				cnt--;
			else
				cnt++;
		}
		printf("%d \n", cnt);
	}
	return 0;
}
